article.title: Directions to Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Driving Directions to the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
9690 S. 300 W., Suite 201D
Sandy, UT 84070

FromI-15 North

  • TakeI-15 SouthtoExit 298(9000 South)
  • Exit right (west) onto9000 Southand proceed toSandy Parkway/450 West(1st light)
  • Turn left (south), go to9120 South& turn left (east)
  • Go to300 West(frontage road) & turn right (south)
  • Proceed 6 blocks south alongfrontage road

FromI-15 South

  • TakeI-15 NorthtoExit 297(10600 South)
  • After exiting, turn right (east) and proceed toState Street
  • Turn left (north), go to light at10000 South(Centennial Way) in Sandy
  • Turn left (west), go underI-15& turn right (north) on300 West(frontage road)
  • Proceed 2 blocks north alongfrontage road

​Sandy Salt Lake Community College Campus

You will arrive at the Sandy Salt Lake Community College campus.Proceedto the PacifiCorp Corporate Partnership Centerbuilding. The Export Assistance Center is located inside at suite 201D.​

article.seometadatadescription: Driving Directions to the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
